snippet.title: Zorya - Designing Aysu the fallen goddess of the night!
snippet.description:
Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/zorya/zorya

Speed drawing of the redesign of Aysu, made by our Concept Artist Kathleen Borduas.

Aysu is the little sister, the one we want the players to protect during the game and help navigate to the end of the level. As such, we felt that her design had to reflect this frailty in the character, to encourage the players to try and protect her.
